mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM TB_FOR_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardtype} AND IS_DEL = 'Y'

SELECT TB.LIST_NUM ,TB.BOARD_IDX ,TB.BOARD_TITLE ,TB.USER_ID ,TB.USER_NM ,TB.UPDT_DATE ,TB.VIEW_CNT ,TB.FILE_CNT FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS LIST_NUM, TB.BOARD_IDX ,TB.BOARD_TITLE ,TB.USER_ID ,TB.USER_NM ,TB.UPDT_DATE ,TB.VIEW_CNT ,TB.FILE_CNT FROM (SELECT TB.*, COUNT(TBF.BOARD_IDX) AS FILE_CNT FROM TB_FOR_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FOR_BOARD_FILES TBF ON TB.BOARD_IDX = TBF.BOARD_IDX WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY TB.BOARD_IDX) TB, (SELECT @rownum:=0) temp WHERE TB.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardtype} AND TB.IS_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY TB.BOARD_IDX DESC) TB WHERE TB.LIST_NUM BETWEEN #{start_num} AND #{end_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FOR_LOGIN_AUTH_HIST ( USER_ID, APPROVE_TIMESTAMP, AUTH_NUM, IS_EXP, IS_DEL, INSRT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{approveTimestamp}, #{authNum}, 'N', 'N', #{insrtDate} )
